actions.text: Amendment SA 4018 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 4018 proposed by Senator Leahy for Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S4675-4676, S4676-4677; text: CR S4676) To extend the deadline given to the Secretary of Homeland Security for the implementation of a new travel document plan for border crossings to June 1, 2009.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4018 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4018 proposed by Senator Leahy for Senator Stevens.

purpose: To extend the deadline given to the Secretary of Homeland Security for the implementation of a new travel document plan for border crossings to June 1, 2009.
